summary: My retextured version of Coolsims really nice Hairstyles
descriptionHtml:
My other: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22012]Garrisons Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17064]The Alligator[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19383]Green Dragon Crescent Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16193]Bleach weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15268]D-Greyman weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14786]Soul Eater weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14968]Stormbringer[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14616]Black Sword, Yoru[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14020]Rorona Zorros Katanas[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357]ApachiiSkyHair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400]My Coolsims retexture mod[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4734]Vampire Gameplay Overhaul[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5521]Rans and Yinsiyue Hairstyles Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6720]Kuma Kuma Kokuma Hair and Bagserk Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5152]Beautiful Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7752]Iron Claw Daggers Fist Weapons Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12797]Soulfang & Darkfang[/url]


======================================================================
Please read the whole wall of text , u have to download something from an other site!
Right click new tab on pics for better compare
======================================================================
[size=+2]
-> 1. Description
-> 2. Install
-> 3. Recommend Downloads
-> 4. Troubleshooting/Tipps
-> 5. Credits[/size]

===================================
1. Description
===================================


Was tired of the old Skyrim Styles and i cant handle 3D Programms properly so thats what i managed.
Sadly the orginal Textures were shiny like hell. Perhaps only my opinion ;) So i removed this. The hairstyles look like the old Skyrim ones.

Changes the Textur from orginal game too. So everything has the same style.


===================================
2. Install
===================================

!Before install!
================

Save your Beautiful Hair or whatever Hair mod u use.


========
Install:
========

1. Download and install:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809]Coolsims Hair Pack by newermind43[/url]

2. Download my Pack and extract into Skyrim dir 

Done


===================================
3. Recommend Downloads
===================================

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6483]Custom NON-VANILLA Hair for NPCs Tutorial by hulebjoern[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923]Extended Slider Colors by Expired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554]Skyrim NPC Editor 0_60 Beta 1_7 by foretrenty[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131]FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2531]AntiFREEZE performance patch 9 ENBSeries by Boris Vorontsov[/url]

===================================
4. Troubleshooting/Tipps
===================================

Optional after install u can delete all Coolsims Meshes and textures except \"skyrim\\data\\textures\\Actors\\Character\\hair\" Leave the 2 files and u have only new Textures for the vanilla styles.

You can use the Hairstyles for men too. go to Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/female copy contents, make new dir in Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair named Male so its Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male past in, 

have fun ;)

===================================
5. Credits

===================================

Thanks to Anto from coolsims.net
Thanks to Lucha for original mod for Oblivion
Thanks to newermind43 for bringing the Styles to Skyim
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to AnOldFriend
